Title: L-ornithine L-aspartate for people with cirrhosis and hepatic encephalopathy
Abstract: © 2016 The Cochrane Collaboration.This is a protocol for a Cochrane Review (Intervention). The objectives are as follows: To assess the beneficial and harmful effects of L-ornithine L-aspartate versus placebo, no intervention, or other active interventions for people with cirrhosis and hepatic encephalopathy.
